Description:
***UNDER CONTRACT***
Superb Lifestyle and Smart Investment
Set yourself up for lifestyle or investment success, with this traditional single-level unit in the beating heart of Ringwood.
Lavished with natural sunlight, the home showcases a simple, yet functional floorplan, where polished floorboards and fresh paint create a comfortable ambience for immediate enjoyment or enhancement.
Instantly inviting, a spacious front lounge offers ample room for relaxation and leads through to an original gas equipped kitchen with accompanying meals area.
Two robed bedrooms supply restful accommodation both sharing the use of a central bathroom and a separate toilet.
The laundry accesses a private courtyard, where you can unwind or alfresco dine with friends amid low maintenance garden surrounds.
Split system heating/cooling and a double lock-up garage complete the attractive easy-care package, which is located within arm's reach of all the area's key attractions.
Situated within Ringwood's thriving retail and entertainment precinct, it is a short stroll to Eastland Shopping Centre, Town Square, Costco, Ringwood Train Station and the Mullum Mullum Creek Trail. Only minutes from EastLink, childcare centres and schools; including zoned Ringwood Secondary College.
Insights: First listed on 2 October, this unit has been on Domain for 19 days (last updated on 2 October). It was last sold in 2000 and 111 other 2 bedroom unit in Ringwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Corner Of Comfort
Experience the splendour of space and superior lifestyle satisfaction, with this cherished one-owner heart warmer on a low maintenance 663sqm (approx.) block.
Cuddling a corner position, with lush reserve vistas, it supplies the perfect environment to raise a family, reaching premium schools and amenities within minutes.
Spread across one expansive level, the home is comfortable, functional and simply pristine; flaunting several modern upgrades throughout.
Dual living zones gift parents and children their own space to enjoy; including a sun-bathed lounge/dining room and a large rumpus.
A contemporary kitchen and family/meals area combine at the heart of the home. It showcases Ilve cooking appliances, a new dishwasher, appliance cupboard, glass splashbacks, sleek black Caesarstone countertops plus an island breakfast bar.
A long corridor leads the way to three queen-size bedrooms with built-in robes plus a fourth bedroom/study. The deluxe master bedroom features a trio of built-in wardrobes and a chic renovated ensuite. The remaining rooms share a central bathroom and separate toilet.
Outside, a paved alfresco rests within a secure backyard, offering easy entertaining plus ample room for children and pets to play.
Extras include: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, door alarms, a substantial amount of storage, a 4,000L water tank plus a remote enclosed single carport.
Ready to be embraced by a new family, the residence is within walking distance to buses, Mahon and McAlpin Reserves, Ellie V. Pullin Pre-School, Holy Spirit Community School plus Ringwood North shops and eateries.
The property is located only a short commute to Ringwood North Primary School, Yarra Valley Grammar, Norwood and Luther Colleges, Eastland and the EastLink freeway.
Noel Jones Real Estate has taken every precaution to establish the accuracy of this information however shall in no event accept liability for loss or damage suffered by a third-party. People must make their own enquiries as to its accuracy.

Description:
Approved plans and permits for 3 modern townhouses!
Promising approved plans and permits to build 3 ultra-modern townhouses on an expansive 1044 sqm (approx.) of prime time Croydon land, this exceptional opportunity is a developers dream in a location just moments to picturesque parklands and terrific schools!
All the hard work has been done for you with townhouse plans and permits already ticked off by the council! On a sizeable flat block with very little trees, developers will love building the new residences, with plans allowing for one 4 bedroom townhouse and two other 3 bedroom townhouses. Each townhouse has a considered layout over two levels, and delivers generous proportions and amazing versatility. The current dwelling also comes with a secure lease for buyers who dont want to build straight away and can enjoy excellent rental returns!
Croydon locations dont get much better than this Diane Crescent address, which has you so close to Esther Park with sporting facilities and the Bushy Creek Trail, Manchester Primary School, Mooroolbark College, Barngeong Reserve Kindergarten, Mooroolbark Terrace Shopping Centre, buses, and Mooroolbark Station.
Insights: 60 Diane Crescent, Croydon VIC 3136 was last sold in 2010.

Description:
CONVENIENT LIVING WITH GREAT STAMP DUTY SAVINGS
Starting from $850,000 - $910,000
Conveniently located close to the heart of Ringwood and Eastlink, are these two impressive townhouses that would suit families, couples or the savvy investor.
Beautiful simplicity is key as Unit One welcomes you into the large open plan living, dining and kitchen with walk in pantry seamlessly flowing out to the beautiful outdoor living. The Master bedroom inclusive of ensuite & WIR adds to the ease of comfort before heading upstairs to another three bedrooms (WIR) and main bathroom, plus a great flex area suitable for a study, bedroom or small living area.
Unit Two similarly offers the four bedrooms, open plan/outdoor blended living plus the upstairs flex space. Together each unit features Blanco S/S appliances, Caesarstone benchtops, chrome tapware and fittings, Oak veneer wide plank flooring, reverse cycle A/C, landscaped gardens, water tank and dual car accommodation.
Also situated close to shops, medical services, Aquanation, Ringwood Golf Course, local reserves and athletic facilities, Aquinas College and public transport.
With building to commence 2020, this is your opportunity to take advantage of great stamp duty savings valued up to $34,000 for an off the plan purchase.
Price List:
Townhouse 1 : $880,000 - $950,000
Townhouse 2 : $850,000 - $910,000
Buyers are also welcomed to consider Units Three & Unit Four, both two bedroom townhouses with open plan living and single car accommodation. Buyers who may be eligible for the Home Builder, Stamp Duty and First Home Buyer Grants could benefit from savings up to $65,000 for an off the plan purchase.
INTERNAL PHOTOS ARE AN EXAMPLE ONLY OF THE BUILDERS QUALITY PRODUCT FROM A PREVIOUS PROJECT.

Address: 14 Brushy Park Road Wonga Park VIC 3115
Description:
***UNDER CONTRACT***
Exclusive 6-Bedroom Family Entertainer
Exclusive by design and location, this extensively renovated 6-bedroom residence delivers remarkable family space and entertaining, with something for the car enthusiast or tradesperson.
- Adapted for the modern family, each generously proportioned zone has a purpose and has been executed with impeccable style, quality and fluency.
- Adorned with Blackbutt hardwood floors, it hosts an expansive open living and dining room - tied together by a sleek new black and white kitchen. Well-appointed, it features soft close cabinetry, a 900mm Ilve upright cooker, downdraft rangehood, a dishwasher, butler's pantry, Caesarstone countertops plus a 4.1m long breakfast bar bench.
- Flaunting an enviable indoor-outdoor flow, timber bi-fold doors open to a covered all-seasons entertaining domain; featuring lighting, an open fireplace, ceiling fan, ducted heating, a blockout bistro blind, gas and water connections plus steps down to a landscaped courtyard.
- Upstairs, a versatile rumpus/recreation room could be set up as the ultimate theatre or games retreat; boasting covered front balcony access plus views right across to Sky High in the Mt Dandenong Ranges.
- Generously accommodating, six queen-size bedrooms (four with built-in robes and two with study nooks), are serviced by three sleek bathrooms with open dual-head showers. Two out of the three bathrooms feature freestanding bathtubs with ceiling-mounted water spouts, including the king-size master, which showcases a beautifully unified dressing room and ensuite that captures the home's most spectacular Mt Dandenong Ranges views.
- Perfect for those with multiple cars, trade or leisure vehicles, it contains an abundance of front yard parking, an internal-access remote enclosed single carport plus a 12m x 6m workshop with a 12ft apex, power and a hoist.
- Lavished with quality extras, it includes: dual ducted heating and evaporative cooling units, ducted vacuum, indoor-outdoor sensor lighting, day-night roller blinds, brand new carpet and underlay, Rinnai instant hot water with temperature control, a covered side clothesline deck plus substantial amounts of storage throughout; including a pull-down ladder accessed attic with lighting and flooring.
- Centrally located to a plethora of fine amenities, it accesses buses, reserves and trails on foot, and a quick, easy commute to Croydon North and Chirnside Park Shopping Centres.
Insights: First listed on 28 September, this house has been on Domain for 23 days (last updated on 28 September).

Description:
An Enviable Family Lifestyle
Superbly renovated and located to supply an enviable family lifestyle, this pristine home on 716sqm (approx.) will impress with its spacious dual zone living, all-seasons entertaining and idyllic position near premium schools and amenities.
Framed by neat gardens, it flaunts an inviting sun-splashed interior, accentuated by polished hardwood floorboards, neutral paint tones and modern day/night roller blinds.
Encompassing an excellent floorplan, it hosts an expansive front lounge and dining room for formal occasions or relaxation. This is complemented by an open family/meals area for everyday living.
The stylish centrepiece kitchen maximises on space and quality; equipped with stainless steel appliances, stone countertops plus plentiful cupboard and drawer storage.
Spilling outside via bi-fold doors, a large covered/lit alfresco deck with ceiling fan and café blinds overlooks a securely fenced lawn area; supplying endless year-round entertainment that the whole family will relish.
A long central corridor with dual storage cupboards is flanked by four carpeted bedrooms (three with built-in wardrobes). The master boasts a walk-in wardrobe and a contemporary ensuite. The remaining three rooms share a bathroom with a deep bathtub, shower, vanity and separate toilet.
Additional features include: ducted heating, air conditioning, ceilings fans, a water tank, double carport plus a single garage/workshop.
A fabulous location adds further allure, reaching buses, Mullum Mullum Creek Trail, Kalinda Urban Forest, Burnt Bridge shops, Kalinda Primary School and Yarra Valley Grammar on foot.
It's also only a short drive to Luther College, Good Shepherd Primary School, McAdam Square, Eastland and the EastLink freeway.

Description:
Stylish Unit in the Heart of Croydon
Offering first home buyers, investors and downsizers an exciting opportunity, this three bedroom unit is superbly located walking distance to Croydons popular shopping strip, cafés, restaurants and train station. Set in lush garden surrounds on a low maintenance 387sqm (approx.) allotment, it features a generous open-plan living/dining area and an open kitchen boasting a stainless-steel oven/cooktop and sleek benches The bedrooms are spacious with the master featuring a walk-in robe and ensuite, while the remaining beds include built-ins and share a sparkling central bathroom with separate WC. Complete with heating and cooling plus a single lock-up garage with internal access, this exceptional home demands your attention. Conveniently located near quality schools, parkland and bike paths with easy access to EastLink and the Eastern Freeway.
***PhilipWebb Real Estate Coronavirus Update***
The health of our valued clients and staff is our highest priority. Please note the following changes to our open for inspection processes as we navigate the current Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation.
Inspections are strictly by appointment only. Please register your contact details to arrange a private inspection with the listing agent
Attendees are limited to one agent and one prospective purchaser, who may be accompanied by one other person (either an existing household member or intimate partner) and their children under 18 years old if there are no appropriate alternative care arrangements available
Please maintain safe social distancing of 1.5m from anyone in attendance including PhilipWebb staff
Face masks must be worn at all times
Avoid touching surfaces including fittings and fixtures within the property
Hand sanitiser is provided
We kindly ask that you refrain from attending an inspection if you:
Are experiencing flu-like symptoms
Have tested positive to, or have recently been in contact with someone diagnosed with Coronavirus
Have recently travelled overseas or have been in direct contact with someone who has
Were all in this together and we thank you for your understanding.

Description:
Revamped in a Relaxed Setting
A tranquil and conveniently placed unit surrounded by plenty of amenities and activities situated on approximately 168sqm. Providing a wonderful investment, first home or ideal for those empty nesters, come enjoy this well-presented residence that's truly pleasing with fresh updates and a cheery outlook.
Boasting a well-devised and easy floor plan that's highlighted by its generous lounge with exposed brick feature wall. The pristinely presented kitchen is adorned with stainless-steel gas appliances including a dishwasher as well as plenty of room for casual meals.
The bathroom is gleaming and new and the sizable two bedrooms come robed. The courtyard is private and serene with low maintenance flair and access to the garage. Additional features include a separate toilet, laundry with external door, visitor car space, external blinds, split system unit, ceiling fans, screen doors and hallway storage cupboard.
Within a convenient walking distance to Eastland shops and restaurants, Maroondah Highway, Ringwood train and bus station, Eastlink, Eastern Freeway and Costco along with easy access to Ringwood Secondary College, Aquinas College, Great Ryrie Primary School, Eastwood Primary School and Tintern Grammar. Nearby leisure facilities include Jubilee Park, Russell Lucas Oval, Ringwood Football Club, Aquanation, Ringwood Lake, Ringwood swimming club and Ringwood City Soccer club.
Private Inspections are available!
Please contact the agent to book in a private inspection to view this listing.

Description:
Family comfort opposite serene park.
Set behind a charming picket fence and offering a tranquil view of the adjacent park, beyond the appealing exterior, this comfortable three-bedroom home delivers a light filled and relaxing atmosphere underpinned by a list of appreciable appointments throughout.
The enduring quality of this triple-fronted abode has withstood the test of time and promises to respond to your every need. Step inside and be greeted by the spacious lounge showcasing neutral tones and the warmth of polished floorboards that result in an undeniably comfortable and welcoming interior-a theme echoed throughout.
The home continues to impress with a well-equipped kitchen. Conveniently located adjoining the meals area and an absolute pleasure to work in, features include; stainless steel Chef electric oven, gas stove, dishwasher, large corner pantry, abundant bench space, tiled splashback and LED lights.
Good-sized bedrooms are rare, but this home accommodates well. The large master is fitted with a triple built-in robe while the additional two robed bedrooms are located off the same L-shaped hallway. The bathroom offers a relaxed space for quiet contemplation, incorporating a separate bath, shower, corner vanity and adjoining toilet.
Devoted to ensuring all the needs of a busy couple or family are met, the home conveniently provides; keyless entry, separate tiled laundry, gas ducted heating, air-conditioning, decorative wall panelling, enclosed front yard, low-maintenance rear courtyard and a generously-scaled covered entertaining area.
This home is situated only a short walk from McAdam Square Shopping Centre, Lipscombe Park Reserve, Ainslie Parklands Primary School, The Good Shepherd Primary School, Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar. Mullum Mullum Creek Trail is at the end of the road and the home is also within close proximity to Croydon Railway Station, tennis courts, hospitals, Eastlink freeway and Croydon Memorial Pool.
A rare opening exists to acquire this spectacular property that not only caters to all your needs, but offers a uniquely beautiful location.

Description:
Triple opportunity for family or investors
A unique opportunity ideally suited to extended families and investors, this quiet allotment houses a 2-3 bedroom home with 2 bedroom unit/home office which will help to offset the mortgage, all on the same title on this leafy Croydon street. A charming weatherboard with hardwood polished floors and original ceiling roses and cornices boasts street frontage. Displaying 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, master zoned on entry with chic rainfall ensuite and main bathroom with large corner bath indulgence.
Open plan design encompasses living, dining and a vibrant high-end European integrated fire, requiring minimal maintenance and delivering maximum efficiency. Matched with a stylish kitchen with s/s oven, gas cooktop and dishwasher. Host guests on a front verandah with covered area or back decking linking to a separate studio with bed/living, smart bathroom with BI laundry and rainfall shower, brand new soft-close kitchen with electric cooker, dishwasher and breakfast bar. Next door to a self-contained 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom (2 WCs) unit with living and kitchen disability compliant with ramp and railings. All dwellings have a large common garden.
An ideal arrangement for families with older parents/inlaws, university students or children saving for a house. It also represents a great opportunity to lease 1 or all 3.
Walk to restaurants and cafes and minutes to Burnt Bridge and McAdam Square shops plus a range of quality schools incl Kalinda PS, Good Shepherd PS, Yarra Valley GS, Rudolf Steiner School, Luther College and Melba College. Buses depart at the top of the street with great connections to Croydon Station. Explore the nearby Mullum Mullum Trail on foot or atop a bike and ride to Eastland and Town Square for a weekend brunch. Minutes to freeway and Eastlink and a leisurely drive to the Yarra Valley wineries.
The main house additionally, offers split system heating cooling, laundry, 3kw solar roof panels, a repointed and resprayed roof and off-street parking for 3 cars.
The studio and unit have polished floorboards, separate electricity meters and split system heating/cooling and the unit additionally offers a separate gas meter, side gate access and is currently leased for $300 PW.

Description:
Ready-to-build block + 25k HomeBuilder Grant.
Secluded off a private laneway, this level 419m2 (approx.) block comes with plans and permit to construct a spacious three-bedroom weatherboard home. Whether you're desiring to build this contemporary residence and adapt it to suit your own style or you're a builder searching for the perfect next project, this superb property comes with its own title and no body corporate.
Upon completion of the home, this sweeping single-level floorplan will feel open, roomy and modern, incorporating a generous living and dining area perfect for everyday relaxation and entertaining. The kitchen creates a sense of luxury, showcasing a huge central island with breakfast bar, sizable butler's pantry and generous bench space suitably designed for meal preparation.
The kitchen offers glass sliding door access to the private decking where enviable outdoor entertaining will be enjoyed by family and friends for years to come, also doubling as a second living option. Cascading down to a grassy courtyard, the rear yard is secure and also comprises a shed, while other inclusions of the home list as; study and remote-entry double garage with internal and rear access.
When it's time to unwind, the master affords a calming space to collect your thoughts, featuring a walk-in robe and full ensuite with large shower, vanity and toilet. Zoned off a private hallway, bedrooms two and three are thoughtfully fitted with built-in robes and share a central bathroom comprising a separate bath, shower and twin vanity.
This property is located just a brief walk from The Mall shopping strip, Tarralla Creek, Eastfield Park with barbeque area and playground, Tinternvale Primary School, Tintern Grammar, as well as being within close proximity to Ringwood East Railway Station, Eastwood Primary School, EastLink freeway, cafes and restaurants.
This amazing property affords a truly rare opportunity to buy now and potentially receive the $25,000 HomeBuilder Grant.

Description:
Smart Lifestyle Choice Or Investment
Contact Agent for Property Video. Property is Vacant.
A secure, affordable entry point into the market or lucrative investment, this stylish heart of Ringwood apartment offers sleek modern living within a boutique 4-year young complex.
Set on the top floor, it encompasses a fluent open floorplan, where a living/dining room incorporates a gloss white kitchen with soft-close cabinetry, Bosch stainless steel appliances, stone countertops and mirrored glass splashbacks. A connecting balcony allows you to dine outside in complete privacy. Both bedrooms feature built-in sliding wardrobes and share the use of a sleek floor-to-ceiling tiled bathroom with a large shower and toilet.
Comfort is assured with split system heating/air conditioning, while other luxuries include: camera intercom entry, basement stacker car space, storage cage plus an open laundry with included washer/dryer, cupboards, stone countertops and mirrored glass splashbacks.
Anchored in the centre of all the action, it is within a minutes' walk to Eastland Shopping Centre, the popular Town Square dining precinct, Costco, Ringwood Train Station and the Mullum Mullum Creek Trail. Only minutes from primary schools, zoned Ringwood Secondary College and the EastLink freeway entry.
Noel Jones Real Estate has taken every precaution to establish the accuracy of this information however shall in no event accept liability for loss or damage suffered by a third-party. People must make their own enquiries as to its accuracy.

Description:
The PERFECT home!! You've found it!!!
Please follow us on Facebook, YouTube, LinkedIn and Instagram for regular fresh content search "Babet Brothers Real Estate".
Ladies and Gentleman, do we have an amazing opportunity for you today, perfect for both first home buyers, investors, down sizers or young families and located in an excellent location and a short distance to shops, schools and reserves. LOCATION.TICK!!
Resting on a good sized 464m2 block the home itself features 3 great sized bedrooms and a decent yard, simply PERFECT.
This home has it all and features lovely hardwood floors throughout. The living area is generous in its proportions and features a good sized functional kitchen with plenty of bench top space and freestanding stainless steel oven and cooktop. There is also a walk in butlers pantry! How good is that!
The kitchen overlooks the dining area so that you can be right there in the action with family and friends whilst preparing your meals.
The home has heating to keep you warm in winter and air conditioning to keep you cool in summer.
The home presents extremely well, you will love it. There is nothing to spend. Simply pack your things and move straight in.
Location, location, location.everything is either a short drive or walking distance away!
-Eastland shopping centre
-Schools
-Reserves/Parkes
-Train station
-Local shops
Dont miss out. This home will sell fast. Contact the Babet Brothers today to avoid missing out!

Address: 23 Long View Road Croydon South VIC 3136
Description:
Charming Home in Prized Locale
Placed on the high side of the road with sweeping views of the Dandenong's, this charming two bedroom home set on an allotment of 539sqm approximately, is within Tintern Grammar's catchment area and in walking distance to the picturesque Tarralla Creek Trail, taking you to The Mall's Eastfield shops, it represents a marvellous lifestyle and opportunity to reside in this area. Accented by the recently polished timber floors, the living/dining zone flows to the well-appointed kitchen equipped with a new Bellini dishwasher. The spacious robed main bedroom and robed second bedroom share a bathroom and separate toilet. If you enjoy outdoor living there is a great large open grassed area with fruit trees as well as a sheltered paved alfresco area to relax in. Features include split-system heating/cooling (newly installed), ceiling fans, garden shed, water tank, carport, double glazed bedroom windows, security shutters on main windows and recently laid driveway.
Zoned to Tinternvale Primary School (for 2021 enrolments) and within close proximity to public transport, Melba College, Tintern Grammar (within catchment area), Main Street, Croydon shopping strip and supermarket, Croydon Cinemas, Maroondah Hospital, parklands and Eastland Shopping Centre.
To view the due diligence checklist for home and residential property buyers copy link
https://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.

Description:
Vacant Land - Plans to Build 2 Single Storey Dwellings
This is a unique opportunity to either build your brand new dream home or take advantage of the current permits which have been approved for building 2 side by side single-storey 4 bedroom Metricon Homes.
With a wide street frontage of 20.73m and a depth of 41.76m, this block will suit the construction of a wide range of new homes.
Topped off with a location which has you within close proximity to the heart of Croydon and Mooroolbark, opportunities like this one don't come onto the market very often.

Description:
A Sensational Setting for Lifestyle Convenience
Immerse yourself in the heart of all the action with this spotless, split-level townhouse in Croydon's vibrant town centre. Situated directly opposite Croydon Park, it's only a minute's stroll to the eateries and shops in Croydon's Main Street, Croydon Train Station and Croydon Central Shopping Centre.
- Cosy & inviting interior with neutral fixtures & fittings to suit any style
- Boasting high ceilings, plush carpet and an open plan design
- Well-equipped kitchen comprises stainless steel appliances and dishwasher
- Adjoining living room with large feature bay window
- Two spacious second floor bedrooms include built-in robes and enjoy their own private balcony
- Serviced by a spotless, central bathroom with shower over bath
- Split system heating & cooling for seasonal comfort
- Secure storage cubicle and single car space
- Picturesque views of Croydon Park
- Additional features include Euro laundry and security door entry
